title: O3/oPOM: Establish the new E2E integration test-chain for sprint related acceptance testing
description:
Description
As a devops of the O3 Team
I would like to establish the new E2E integration test-chain for sprint related acceptance testing
So that we can test our developments of the current sprint with our supplying and consuming partner systems
Establishing the new E2E test-chain for sprint related acceptance testing:
Sprint related acceptance and integration testing for the current/running sprint will be carried out on O3/oPOM SIT
User-stories will be accepted into status resolved in the current sprint
O3-SIT needs to be connected to:
PRIO 1:
Flamingo-DEV (Playground)
SeCe-IT DEV
EOS-SIT (done)
LOM-CIT2 (done)
GGS-SIT (done)
oPIM-SIT (not a connection for O3)
PRIO 2:
Magenta Force-SIT (to be checked)
POT-DEV or POT-SIT (to be checked)
PRIO 3:
MAPI-SIT (to be checked)
https://wiki.telekom.de/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=MBFY&title=E2E+integration+test-chain
